More examplesFewer examplesThe natural process of oxidation causes the light-gray marks of a silverpoint drawing to turn, over time, a warm grayish-brown. The paint binder may have gradually undergone internal changes caused by oxidation. Antioxidants fight oxygen-free radicals that cause the chemical process of oxidation, which can injure tissue and lead to cancer.In 1980, Sharpless showed how to create pure chiral compounds through an entirely different catalytic reaction, called oxidation.
